casebody.data:
Certiorari Granted.

No. 464. Clayton Mark & Co. et al. v. Federal Trade Commission.

C. A. 7th Cir. Certiorari granted.

*903Albert R. Connelly, Thurlow M. Cordon, Edward H. Green and W. Denning Stewart for petitioners. Solicitor General Perlman filed a memorandum stating that the Government did not oppose allowance of the petition.
